aeval.description: Filter audio signal according to a specified expression.

afir.name: afir
afir.description: Apply Finite Impulse Response filter with supplied coefficients in 2nd stream.

aformat.name: aformat
aformat.description: Convert the input audio to one of the specified formats.

aiir.name: aiir
aiir.description: Apply Infinite Impulse Response filter with supplied coefficients.

amerge.name: amerge
amerge.description: Merge two or more audio streams into a single multi-channel stream.

anequalizer.name: anequalizer
anequalizer.description: Apply high-order audio parametric multi band equalizer.

anull.name: anull
anull.description: Pass the source unchanged to the output.

aphaser.description: Add a phasing effect to the audio.

arealtime.description: Slow down filtering to match realtime.

aselect.name: aselect

atrim.description: Pick one continuous section from the input, drop the rest.

bandpass.description: Apply a two-pole Butterworth band-pass filter.

bandreject.name: bandreject

biquad.name: biquad
biquad.description: Apply a biquad IIR filter with the given coefficients.

chorus.name: chorus
chorus.description: Add a chorus effect to the audio.

compand.name: compand
compand.description: Compress or expand audio dynamic range.

crystalizer.name: crystalizer
crystalizer.description: Simple expand audio dynamic range filter.

dcshift.name: dcshift

extrastereo.name: extrastereo
extrastereo.description: Increase difference between stereo audio channels.

flanger.name: flanger

hdcd.name: hdcd

highpass.name: highpass

lowpass.description: Apply a low-pass filter with 3dB point frequency.

aevalsrc.name: aevalsrc

hilbert.description: Generate a Hilbert transform FIR coefficients.

anullsink.description: Do absolutely nothing with the input audio.

bbox.name: bbox
bbox.description: Compute bounding box for each frame.

colorkey.description: Turns a certain color into transparency. Operates on RGB colors.

convolve.description: Convolve first video stream with second video stream.
